verses.roman:
sūrya yaiche udaya kari' cāhe lukāite
bujhite nā pāri taiche tomāra carite

synonyms: sūrya—the sun; yaiche—just like; udaya—appearance; kari'-making; cāhe—wants; lukāite—to hide; bujhite—to understand; nā—not; pāri—able; taiche—similarly; tomāra—Your; carite—in the character.
translation: "It is as if the sun, after rising, wanted to hide itself. We cannot understand such characteristics in Your behavior."
